Package com.lopl.melody.commands.music

Class Play

java.lang.Object
com.lopl.melody.slash.SlashCommand
com.lopl.melody.commands.music.Play
public class Play
extends SlashCommand
Play Command General functionality is defined here When entering this command in a guild chat, you are able to search for a song, that is going to be played in your Voice Channel. Possible usage of the command:

/play with a link: When entering "/play" followed by a link, this link will be played directly

/play with a query: When entering "/play" followed by any string, the string will be searched on Spotify. The results will be displayed in a MessageEmbed. You can select from here what song to play with provided Buttons. Button Click will be handled in the clicked(ButtonClickEvent, boolean).

/play with type and query: You can enter a search type for your query right before your query. Possible types are "playlist", "user" and "track".

  • Constructor Details

    • Play

      public Play()
      Constructor for a Play Command Object. This is instantiated when building the Command Handler or for temporary operations

      SlashCommand.name The name of the command. The string you have to type after the '/'. i.e. /play SlashCommand.category The category of the command. Commands will be sorted by that SlashCommand.help The help message, in case someone types /help [command] SlashCommand.description This description will be shown together with the command name in the command preview

  • Method Details

    • onUpsert

      protected net.dv8tion.jda.api.requests.restaction.CommandCreateAction onUpsert​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.requests.restaction.CommandCreateAction cca)
      This will fire whenever a command reload is executed. this defines how the play command is build.
      Overrides:
      onUpsert in class SlashCommand
      Parameters:
      cca - the object the command is build with. you can modify it as you want.
      Returns:
      the finished play command builder with an option for a search query

    • execute

      protected void execute​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SlashCommandEvent event)
      This will fire whenever a user enters /play ... in a guild textchannel. If the requesting member is in a vc and the command is correct, the bot will join you and a list of possible search answers are presented to you. You can navigate with buttons and play your preferred songs
      Specified by:
      execute in class SlashCommand
      Parameters:
      event - all the event data

    • handlePlayCommand

      private void handlePlayCommand​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SlashCommandEvent event, @Nonnull net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild, Play.Player player)
      This will fire whenever a user enters /play ... in a guild textchannel. The requesting member is in a vc and the command is correct. Therefore the bot will join you and a list of possible search answers are presented to you. You can navigate with buttons and play your preferred songs
      Parameters:
      event - all the event data
      player - the player that should be used

    • clicked

      protected void clicked​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.ButtonClickEvent event, boolean anonymous)
      This will fire when a user clicked on a button regarding this command. The Button has to be registered beforehand with SlashCommand.registerButton(Button). The regarding message will be searched and continued with executeButtonAction(ButtonClickEvent, Guild, SpotifyMessage)
      Overrides:
      clicked in class SlashCommand
      Parameters:
      event - all the button click event data
      anonymous - is true if the button was not cached and the class was found only with the ID
